description: This file defines Flutter widgets related to financial transactions and budgeting, specifically custom Card-based UI components for displaying transaction items and budget summaries.

classes.name: TransactionListTile
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a transaction as a styled card with details like amount, description, category, and optional delete action.

classes.name: BudgetCard
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that represents a budget as a styled card, showing category, spent amount, limit, and progress indicator.

methods.name: build (TransactionListTile)
methods.description: Builds the UI for the transaction list tile, displaying transaction details with color coding and delete option.

methods.name: build (BudgetCard)
methods.description: Builds the UI for the budget card, with a progress bar indicating spending against the limit.
